UPPSALA FRENCH FILMFESTIVAL
22-25 November 2018, SlottBiografen

Presentation

Kulturernas Karneval (Carnival of Cultures) is a big cultural meeting and a festival which includes a thundering carnival parade and a 2-day festival filled with concerts, dance performances, workshops, theater, a food and craft market and loads of children’s activities.

The festival will take place 22-25th of November 2018. Welcome to visit Uppsala’s own festival filled with love, fellowship and joy.
